required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single Dose Study of LY3023703 in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Dose, Dose-Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of LY3023703 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This is a phase I study of LY3023703 in healthy participants. The purposes of this study are to look at safety, how well the study drug is tolerated, how much of the study drug gets into the blood stream, and how long it takes the body to get rid of it when given to humans. Information about any side effects that may occur will also be collected. Participants will remain in the study for approximately 3 months. This study is for research purposes only and is not intended to treat any medical condition.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with one or more drug related adverse events (AEs) or any serious AEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 7 days after administration of study drug

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 7 days after administration of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: area under the concentration curve (AUC) of LY3023703
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 7 days after administration of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics: percent change from baseline of ex vivo whole blood prostaglandin E (PGE) synthesis after lipopolysaccharide (LPS) stimulation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 7 days post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics: percent change from baseline of urinary excretion of prostaglandin E(2) metabolite (PGEM)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 24 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics: percent change from baseline of urinary excretion of prostacyclin metabolite (PGIM)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 12 hours post dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacodynamics: percent change from baseline of urinary excretion of thromboxane A metabolite (TXAM)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 12 hours post dose

arm_group.description: Single dose of placebo administered orally on up to one occasion separated by at least a 3 week wash out period.
Up to 6 single escalating doses of LY3023703 (0.1 mg up to 60 mg) administered orally on up to two occasions per participant separated by at least a 3 week wash out period.
Positive control. Single 400 mg dose of celecoxib administered orally, open label, on one occasion separated by at least a 3 week washout period.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Overtly healthy individuals based on the history and physical examinations as determined by the investigator
- Body mass index between 18.5 and 32.0 kilograms per square meter (kg/m^2), inclusive
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have known allergies to LY3023703 or any components of the formulation, celecoxib, or sulfonamides. Participants with known aspirin allergy, allergic reaction to nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), or allergies or intolerance to other selective microsomal prostaglandin E synthase (mPGES-1) inhibitors should also be excluded
- Have the presence of active peptic ulcer disease, gastrointestinal (GI) bleeding, chronic gastritis, inflammatory bowel disease, or chronic diarrhea, or positive Helicobacter pylori serology
- Use NSAIDs, celecoxib, aspirin, or acetaminophen (at doses greater than 1 gram per day) within 14 days of screening
